attributes.action: Change the mobility allowance to make the system fairer to disabled children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under current guidelines only children aged 3 or over can only qualify for mobility allowance.
Those children under 3 years old are left without help or assistance from Mobility allowance.
Even when the child does reach the age of 3 they have to qualify for Higher rate mobility and if they do not reach higher rate they must wait until the age of 5 to get lower rate payment.

The goverments view on Mobility is that a childs mobility is not effected until 3 years old in a way which could impact on the child or parents life.
There are children of all ages from birth that need mobility allowance.
Imagine the stresses of carrying oxygen tanks on a pushchair on the Bus?

Imagine your child having to have a feeding pump sitting on the bus?
The goverment will not help!

What about these children who are wheelchair bound from there very first steps?
The goverment will not help!

The goverment are ignoring disabled children and are not providing mobility for those children that need it.
We now ask the Goverment to review this policy with immediate effect and explain clearly why they will not treat all children the same and why they discrimnate againist children under 3 simply because of there age.
